title: Not Strong, but Noticeable
author: sclerite
citation: sclerite. "Not Strong, but Noticeable: experience with Kratom (ID 33491)". Erowid.org. Dec 4, 2004. erowid.org/exp/33491
footer:

[ Switch Colors ]
report: I received a 4.1 g kratom extract/resin from on online vendor. I made a tea of about 10oz total volume. The resin dissolved almost completely, the taste and smell definitely that of something active. It is not unpleasant, but not delicious. There is a mild numbing of the mouth and throat as with kava. The effects are mild - general relaxation, sedative, and almost valium-like. This was supposed to be the equivalent of a strong dose, though it is not a strong effect, but definitely noticeable. Might be good for long plane rides or the like.
